Arg.V:
#!/bin/bash
function updatepk() { if [ ! -z $1 ]; then if [ -e /var/run/yum.pid ];then exit 10 fi result=`yum -y update $1 2>&1` status=$? commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: command not found"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: No such file or directory"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "lock /var/run/yum.pid"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "/var/run/yum.pid: another copy is running"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "There was an error communicating with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "This system is not registered with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk pulseaudio
exit 0

isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk pulseaudio-debuginfo
exit 0

Vulnerability.Title: pulseaudio bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description: PulseAudio is a sound server for Linux, UNIX, and similar operating systems. This update fixes the following bugs: Previously, when the PulseAudio server attempted to change the sample rate, it suspended the sink and relied on the module-suspend-on-idle module to resume the sink in the new sample rate. Consequently, disabling module-suspend-on-idle caused lockups on custom setups, leading to silencing the sound. A patch has been applied to fix this bug, and the lockups no longer occur. (BZ#1116319) When the user's home directory was mounted on a linux system from another host using Common Internet File System (CIFS), PulseAudio refused to start as PulseAudio could not set the necessary permissions on the .config/pulse/ directory. A test has been implemented to check whether the file system is a CIFS file system and to exit early the procedure to prevent PulseAudio from failing, thus fixing the bug. (BZ#1136330) Previously, the padsp utility was not using the correct path to preload the PulseAudio library. The broken path has been fixed, and padsp now works as expected. (BZ#1154072) Prior to this update, lt-cpu-test terminated unexpectedly due to a bug in its code. The bug in the unit tests has been fixed, and all tests now pass as expected. (BZ#1166069) Previously, bluetooth was suspending a bluetooth music transmission, which led to unexpected termination of PulseAudio. This bug has been fixed, and suspending a bluetooth music transmission no longer leads to PulseAudio crashing. (BZ#989552) In addition, this update adds the following enhancements: With this update, the module-combine-sinks module dynamically adapts to the latency of the sinks and the requirements of the application. This avoids stuttering and audio glitches in low latency situations in which audio is routed to multiple outputs. (BZ#1116346) The updated pulseaudio packages now contain various stability improvements. (BZ#982682) Users of pulseaudio are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which fix these bugs and add these enhancements. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
